name: Buddha’s Delight Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Buddha’s Delight Recipe: Chicken (Cubed) 500 g Flour 2 tbsp Corn Flour 2 tbsp Egg 1 Soy Sauce 1 tbsp Salt ½ tsp Black Pepper ½ tsp Mushrooms (Sliced) 4 Sweet Corn ½ cup Ginger (Sliced) 1 inch Garlic (Chopped) 1 tbsp Whole Red Chilies 6 Capsicum (Julienned) 1 Carrot (Julienned) ½ cup Cabbage (Julienned) 1 cup Sugar 1 tbsp Vinegar 1 tbsp Soy Sauce 1 tbsp Salt ½ tsp Pepper ½ tsp Water ½ cup Corn Flour 1 tbsp
instructions: Marinate chicken with salt, pepper, soy sauce, flour, corn flour and egg for 15 minutes. Then deep fry the chicken and keep aside. Heat the oil, sautÃ© ginger and garlic in it for 1 minute. Add in all vegetables with seasoning, sauces, and fried chicken. Finally add in corn flour to thicken the sauce and serve.
